entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, fortunes_ef, json #58883
  • OpenApi ignores JsonNumberHandling.WriteAsString #58882
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcvanilla, basicminimalapivanilla, todosapivanilla #58880
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcvanilla, basicminimalapivanilla, todosapivanilla #58879
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcvanilla, basicminimalapivanilla, todosapivanilla #58878
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries, single_query #58877
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, single_query #58876
  • Preload Blazor WebAssembly resources to improve startup time #58875
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Prototype background thread rendering and multi-threaded runtime for Blazor WebAssembly #58874
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Blazor Explicit Rendering #58871
  • Custom input component not behaving as expected #58869
    10.0-preview1

Closed

  • SignalR Hub Method Invocation Activities are not Recorded while auto Instrumentation is Configured. #58861
  • /Accounts pages don't render and don't throw any errors #58858
  • AddNewtonsoftJson,Causing the middleware to immediately return to the client after executing Next() #58651
  • JwtSecurityTokenHandler.ReadJwtToken is not reading the issuer #58835
  • Blazor Web App / Auto Mode / Counter button not responsive if switch to that page quickly #58860
  • Blazor Streaming Rendering does not show intermediate state when @attribute [Authorize(Roles = "group1")] is used #58813

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix branding #58884
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/2.3] Fix package for Microsoft.Aspnetcore.Razor.Design #58881
    area-infrastructure
  • feat: analyzer and codeFix for kestrel setup `ListenOptions.Listen(IPAddress.Any)` usage #58872
    area-infrastructure, analyzer
  • remove redundant initializer in HttpValidationProblemDetails #58864
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-alpha.1.24560.6 #58862
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • Fix remote asset url condition and look for the PGO'd archive when in a PGO vertical #58873
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • chore: fixed missed conditional theory for testing named pipe #58849
    community-contribution, area-networking, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Add package for consuming Blazor framework assets #58721
    area-blazor
  • Fix IIS outofprocess to remove WebSocket compression handshake #58846
    feature-iis, area-networking
  • Adds the ability to specify an appsettings file for user-jwts #58605
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Convert ref and runtime packs to use the SharedFramework SDK and Arcade's installer tooling #58612
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • no dispatchGlobalEventToAllElements when no renderer attached #58667
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
